items.sentence: Tom didn\'t seem to be as stupid as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t start to study French until he was thirty.
I assure you I\'ll do everything possible to help you.
I built a house within a stone\'s throw of the forest.
I can\'t believe Tom is really planning on doing this.
I can\'t believe that people think Tom is intelligent.
I can\'t believe you actually did something like that.
You\'re a much better singer than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re asking me to do something I don\'t want to do.
You\'re going to have to do that for Tom, aren\'t you?
All the songs I sang for you today were written by me.
How can anyone sleep with all this commotion going on?
I heard that Tom and Mary will get married in October.
We\'re going to Tom\'s birthday party tomorrow, right?
If you\'d known, you would\'ve told me, wouldn\'t you?
That\'s an interesting proposal. I\'ll think about it.
Tom and I are the only ones who survived the accident.
Tom and I have known each other for about three years.
Tom and Mary are going to get married on October 20th.
Tom was walking down the street with Mary at his side.
